name: Pigs Atop
description:
"Pigs. Bricks. "

Break their house! Drop them down! Squash'em out!

Pigs Atop is a brick breaker variant with Wolf and Pigs fairy tale as the base. Drop all Piggies before time's out! Made in MojikenCamp with "juice it or lose it" in mind.  Thank you for playing.

Game Control:

MOUSEMove Wolfie to current cursor positionLMB
MOUSE1Swing Wolfies' tail to paddle ball atop

Credits:
